title: reformat info into tables and add GitHub usernames
issue_title: reformat info into tables and add GitHub usernames
content:
Amanda had asked for the addition of GitHub usernames to this file.  While I was here, I decided to change the text into tables for each team to make it easier to read (IMHO).  There was no ticket for this request.

@ACharbonneau , @raynamharris , @sedrie  and anyone else on Team Copper (@dcppc/dcppc-copper-admin?), I would greatly appreciate any feedback.   

If no changes are necessary, I can attempt to merge.  Not sure if I have the ability to do so, but I'm happy to try.
oops! I wasn't done yet -_-
Also the Copper one isn't right
